topics.title: Standup
topics.content:
# Standup Plugin

Generates a daily standup summary from your recent git activity across all open projects.

## Usage

Click the Standup item in the sidebar rail to view today's standup. Click "Generate" to create a fresh summary based on your recent commits.

Standup history is stored globally so you can review past summaries.
